attributes.additional_details:
The new electronic prescription system that has been put in place to replace the old paper prescriptions has to many flaws to be trusted fully.

I wish to see it withdrawn before it causes the death of a patient.
The flaws as I see them are -

1, Only able to fufill prescription at designated pharmacy.
2, Unable to take script elsewhere if pharmacy has not got all the item/s on it.
3, No back-up if the system is hit by a powercut or loss of connection.
